subject: Recent order #SSN1810
description_text:
Hello, 
I sent an email on June 21st about my order #SSN1810 . I had gotten a response about you guys would be processing the shipment on Monday of this week. I just wanted to check in and make sure that everything is in motion still

conversations.body_text: Hi Maxwell Newman,     Your package has arrived in the U.S. and is awaiting customs clearance. After customs clearance is complete, UPS will pick up the package and there will be a logistics update at that time. It is expected to be delivered for you around the 4th. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZX6190C0300138505
